pages.title: why did you do this are you okay
pages.text: i made this to see if i could make a neocities-friendly mspa viewer! i'm not sure if i'll actually ever use it though :p at least its database is less of a disaster than bloodbound's current php values... i'll be sure to fix that up once it actually enters production
